name: Savage Turret
description:
The first build is here.
Expect a short demo-like gameplay section featuring driving, first-person combat and tower defence. It is all happening on one level. Content is loading and light is baking as you go. In many cases, it will be very apparent.
The first build doesn't have a fail state yet: infinite ammo, infinite resources, no damage from enemies (they still attack you) and the tower base can't be destroyed.
Yet, progression triggers and checkpoints are all implemented.
The game in its current state can take 15 minutes to finish. You'll be treated with a final title screen, signifying that you have experienced all it has to offer as of now.
